video_prompt: A woman steadily walks away from the viewer across a rustic suspension bridge spanning a deep mountain valley. The bridge gently sways with her movement. Fluffy cumulus clouds drift across a bright blue sky. Below, a winding river with visible white rapids flows. Pink cherry blossoms on cliff edges gently sway, with a few petals softly falling.
